product_meta.description:
Now you can live every day like you’ve been to the beach!

Our Salt Hair Mist not only has your hair looking and smelling amazing BUT It's actually taking care of your hair too.

Coconut Oil- Products and heat can leave your hair damaged. Coconut Oil will help to repair that damage as well as leaving your hair smooth & frizz free.

Aloe Vera- Contains something called proteolytic enzymes which repairs dead skin cells on the scalp. It also acts as a great conditioner and leaves your hair all smooth and shiny. It promotes hair growth, prevents itching on the scalp, reduces dandruff and conditions your hair.

So not only have we included this two miracle products in our mist we have also added Salt from The Great Salt Lake-

Salt contains 26 minerals which are beneficial for hair

Salt adds softness, bounce and body to your hair. Due to the presence of essential minerals, it makes your hair shiny and moisturizes it as well as repairs and protects it

Salt is used to treat dandruff

Salt is also used to absorb sweat from the scalp

Salt will also add volume to your hair

But wait we didn't stop there. The water used in our mist comes straight from the Mountains in Utah- That's right- not even touched by human hands- ready to give your curls an instant boost.

Coconut Essential Oil- It smells great, and is gentle on all hair types. Rich with vitamin K & E, coconut oil helps to reduce dandruff, and make hair follicles healthy.

So trust us you’ll want to be using our Salt Hair Mist daily.Breathe in that gorgeous smell and let your hair reap the rewards
